text: again I typically prefer to sort this by value so that you can really see where the larger players are at which is what I would consider this section here and you can see that there's some entries across different days phasing into positions but this is very much centralized in the 30 strike and the 35 strike hands down so if we slide this out of the way we come into chewy we go out here again to the next primary expiration 19 July and we take a look at these we have the 30s which are becoming very very active there's 15,000 oi with 9,000 almost 10,000 transacted today so there's a lot of people moving into this and then if we come out here to the 35s you'll see another big block of people 16,700 oi and 5,000 traded today so there are absolutely people building a position in here the volatility is not that high and if we take a look really quick at the out of the- money implied volatility for an idea we still have a standard volatility smile at least for this near-term expiration let's take a look at the 19 July yeah so again if you've looked at any of my other videos you'll notice that this looks so different than what GameStop looks like in here there's standard emphasis to the downside typically you'll see something that looks more like this that's tail heavy to the downside in terms of implied

text: so again if you've looked at any of my other videos you'll notice that this looks so different than what GameStop looks like in here there's standard emphasis to the downside typically you'll see something that looks more like this that's tail heavy to the downside in terms of implied volatility are a little more equal whereas a lot of GameStop implied volatility for the out of the monies is actually very high on the call side meaning fear or expectation of upside movement you're not seeing that here but you do see some of these really large Kinks like this right here behind my head that's also very tradable but yeah even these 30s they're not overpaying for them a ton which is kind of nice from a practitioner standpoint in terms of your entries but this also doesn't necessarily look to me like there's just a bunch of act ity going on something massive coming down the pike as I always say that doesn't mean that that's not the case but this definitely looks a little bit slower than what I'm seeing in uh GameStop so as always any questions let me know be an outlier see you guys later
